description: OPINION & ORDER  re:  19     MOTION  for Attorney Fees . filed by Z.  H. The Court grants Plaintiff's motion for attorneys' fees and costs with the  modifications to hourly rates and billable hours detailed above.  Therefore, Plainti ff is due $15,981.60 for the underlying administrative action and  $1,157.63 for the federal action. As stated above, the firm may bill $605.26 in costs.  Accordingly, Plaintiff is entitled to a combined total of $17,744.49. The c ourt finds  that this reduction affords the "rough justice" that is the "essential goal in shifting  fees." Y.S., 2024 WL 1759218, at *2. The Clerk of Court is respectfully directed to  enter judgment as described above and close the case. It is SO ORDERED.  (Signed by Judge Edgardo Ramos on 7/12/2024)   (jca)
